mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Shafer, Conrad
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Lowellville, Mahoning Co., O [Louisville, Mahoning County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Shafer, Conrad Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture hand. Flesh wound of arm. Ball passed directly through inner aspect of arm. Location Wounded: Cloyd's Mountain [Virginia]. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Deserted 1865/04/14. Readmitted 1865/05/10. Discharged on certificate of disability.
